info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 8:13PM CDT until March 18 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Ector County in western Texas... Eastern Andrews County in western Texas... Northeastern Ward County in western Texas... Midland County in western Texas... Martin County in western Texas... Crane County in western Texas... Southern Dawson County in western Texas... Northern Upton County in western Texas...
* Until 945 PM CDT.
* At 812 PM CDT, a dust channel was over Midland, moving northeast at 30 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...NWS employee reported less than one quarter mile visibility between Midland and Odessa.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 89 and 91, and between mile markers 95 and 163.
Locations impacted include... Cotton Flat, Stanton, Lenorah, Crane, Midland Airpark, Odessa, Midland International Air and Space Port, Penwell, Ackerly, Stanton Municipal Aiport, West Odessa, Tarzan, Greenwood, Andrews, Midkiff, Crane County Airport, Goldsmith, Warfield, Skywest Airport, and Courtney.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 9:45 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 9:45 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Andrews, TX; Crane, TX; Dawson, TX; Ector, TX; Martin, TX; Midland, TX; Upton, TX; Ward, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:45 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:45 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
